entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmBuildTests are failing in CI #81302
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to retrieve the ".override" declaration with the reflection APIs #81299
  • DebuggerTests.MiscTests.CannotDebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithoutPdb test timed out on CI #81294
  • Binary DataContract Serialization raises exception with certain contents. #81290
  • Linux runtime only uses 1 core of those available when running with forced scheduler affinity #81289
  • [API Proposal]: Rethink and implement use case of CS0416 #81287
  • Address NativeAOT header file strategy to allow windows global definitions to co-exist #81285
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Support debugging multi-threaded apps #81282
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #81280
  • STJ should support deserializing/serializing nested polymorphism #81279
  • Generalize Arm64 ldr/str to ldp/stp optimization #81278
    8.0.0
  • Error 1067 during windows service stop #81274
  • [API Proposal]: JsonConverter to deserialize Dictionary<string,object> as values objects not JsonElements #81270
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.TryGetTypeInfo #81269
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix calling JS functions from workers #81268
    8.0.0
  • Consider improving the source formatter in the STJ source generator #81260
    8.0.0
  • Don't use System.Linq.Expressions in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory with AOT #81258
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationToken.OnReset event #81255
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests segfault in monoeg_g_hash_table_insert_replace #81249

Closed

  • ConfigurationBinder.Get<T> ignores value types .ctor #81298
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision based on ref counts and liveness interact in incorrect ways #81019
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Abstract System.Reflection.Emit public types #78542
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Count / number of occurrences of a value in a span #59466
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Low level API support for Objective-C scenarios #77472
    8.0.0
  • Improve efficiency of parsing of Transfer-Encoding: chunked on HTTP/1.1 response #63052
    8.0.0
  • Lacking performance of `StringBuilder.Replace` #80952
  • Do not use OfType<T>() with impossible types #33770
    8.0.0
  • NegotiateStream Wireshark decoder #80818
    8.0.0
  • Skipping System.Threading.Tasks test suite for mono interpreter #35916
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type cannot delegate derived type declaration to sub-classes #81236
  • [mono] Assertion at sgen-stw.c:77, condition not met #76805
    8.0.0
  • Exception not being thrown when null value encountered for non-nullable type #81007
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77551
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77552
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<Int32> #79292
    8.0.0
  • JSON source generator emits CS0612 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #76829
    8.0.0
  • Exception when Deserializing Nullable<double> #81025
  • FindPythonWindows does not error gracefully #59724
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Clean up StackTrace/StackFrame icalls. #81303
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fixing a comment attached to DEFAULT_UNROLL_LOOP_MAX_ITERATION_COUNT #81300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sprinkle some more readonly around #81297
    area-Meta
  • Re-enable OneLocBuild #81296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid passing the icall name/c function name to mono_reg… #81293
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.x
  • JIT: build pred lists before instrumentation #81288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable function pointer test for crossgen due to an existing issue #81286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    area-System.Resources
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    area-System.Resources
  • [mono][jit] Improve handling of the ldtoken+ltoken+Type::op_Equal opt… #81277
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix calling JS functions from workers #81273
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add reflection path for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #81262
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix ReaderWriterLock when using it in recursive scenarios and multiple instances on the same thread #81257
    area-System.Threading
  • Change Nullability annotation on `ISelectionService.PrimarySelection` #81254
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Using `cmovns` for faster division #81252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81250
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix x86 clrgc loading #81176
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce the size of HttpRequestMessage and HttpRequestHeaders #81251
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Pin the sdk version to avoid a regression #81301
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testing CI #81259
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] conditional revert of wasm imports optimization #81275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure we specify arguments only when the test ask for it #80947
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Force partial trim mode for browser bench #81284
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: update `fgReplaceJumpTarget` to maintain pred lists #81246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid allocations in 'Transfer-Encoding: Chunked' check #81253
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #80996
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono] Re-enable System.Threading.Tasks tests for desktop interp #81046
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: consolidate inlining code in fgInline.cpp #81198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix type pushed by mkrefanytype #81261
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Skip failing System.Diagnostics.Process tests #81231
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add additional bool-only ToFrozenDictionary/Set overloads #81256
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Make a number of improvements to the System.Text.Json source generator #81239
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add @kotlarmilos as code owner #81209
    area-Meta
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable eventsourceerror test for Windows ARM32 #81244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - X64 - Peephole optimization to possibly skip emitting `and reg, -1` #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve -static-pie support #81163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve error for missing Python #81202
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix nullability on `IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer` #81203
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `printf` implementation #81243
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix special sweep issue for workstation #81248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate a bounds check in `NumberBuffer` #81039
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix SslStream IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Android API 21-27 #81224
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools as for the rest of repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] arm64 neon opcodes #81026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Loop alignment support for xarch #81206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Thoughts on VSD support #2147
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement delegate constructors and managed helpers #2180
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable shared generics #2176
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge PR 67238 - JIT: Refactor call argument representation #2177

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 SDK's dotnet.exe change the attached terminal code page when its standard output is redirected #30170
  • ResolvePackageAssets: DisablePackageAssetsCache still requires a valid project.assets.json to exist #30167

Closed

  • Issue with building and publishing Asp.Net 4 website in docker file #30100

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 3xx to main #30174
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding extra check to identity on template installation #30163

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2098470 #30128
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to osx 12 #30149
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • add named monitor for fixing floating tests #30138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor CSharpSyntaxWrite. Introduce OneLineStatementSyntaxRewriter, FieldDeclarationSyntaxRewriter. Add Tests for SyntaxRewriter(s). #30141
    Area-GenAPI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #6920

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `IDE0059` is not fired for property pattern assignment #66573
  • Introduce parameter should not be offered for literal values in attribute argument lists #66572
  • CultureInfo.CurrentCulture API banned in Analyzers but alternative API is inaccessible #66566
  • Correctly handle constructed types in parameterless ctor determination #66564
    Backlog

Closed

  • Whitespace normalization not ideal for immediate assignment to properties #42336
  • "abstract void Main()" compiles successfully #66516
    17.6
  • False negative for IDE0060 (parameter not used) when combining local functions and lambdas #66391
    Backlog
  • Assertion in nullable walker: "Did not find BoundCall in the map." #65053
    17.6
  • CA1707 applies to method names #66574
  • Missing completion for raw string after typing `$$"""` #66538
    Backlog
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `ref`, `readonly`, `new` keywords for return types. #66376
    17.6
  • Possible to detect "external" global using aliases in analyzer? #66517
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `in`, `out` keywords for generic types #66377
    17.6
  • Assertion in nullable walker (some nodes were not analyzed) #65056
    17.6
  • Nullable enums in parameter value shown as numbers in SymbolDisplay #66514

PullRequests

Created

  • Change the version number to preview 6 #66580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #66578
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce parameter - don't offer for arguments or attribute arguments #66577
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Prefer list-pattern for length-only counterexamples (#66541)" #66576
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid unnecessary parsing in brace-completion #66575
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Report when MethodImplOptions.Synchronized is used on async lambda #66568
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable static restore in more locations #66567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move compiler from netcoreapp3.1 to net6.0 #66565
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reduce delegate allocations in LanguageParser #66551
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Disregard static abstract methods as entrypoint candidates #66525
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Complete interpolated raw string when more than one dollar sign #66554
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add an API for the parsed command line back from an OptionsProcessor #66546
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update capabilities for streaming references #66562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66549
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make SymbolDisplay show nullable enum values as enums #66528
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • LocalRewriter.DecisionDagRewriter - Remove redundant field #66539
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66581
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce parser helper for parsing separated syntax lists. #66552
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline diagnostics - integration tests #66563
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow extract method in when statement #66165
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Moldinium: Dependency Tracking for Blazor #46302
  • Inconsistent translation of template strings #46301
  • Support serializing polymorphic body types with STJ in R equestDelegateGenerator #46297
  • Handle PlatformNotSupportedException from NegotiateClientCertificateAsync on Mac #46294
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #46293
  • Blazor United feedback (it's good) #46292
  • Razor generates invalid code when using @bind on a component with a struct Generic Constraint #46290
  • Blazor error shows up in search results #46289
  • Be able to change protocolMode on WASM Authentication.Msal #46287
  • [Question] How to set minimal API OpenApi validation info without DataAnnotations? #46286
  • Source code build Issue #46285
  • [Question] How do I get route values in a CORS preflight request? #46284

Closed

  • `ResponseCookies.Delete(key)` not deleting when website is not in root path #46158
  • Posibility to Customize Model Binding errors Key #46238
  • Update "api" project template to use new methods on Random #46087
    8.0-preview2
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 2): General Usage #42091
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Issue with building and publishing Asp.Net 4 website in docker file #46264
  • [AOT] Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results for trimming and AOT #46075
    8.0
  • IEndpointRouteBuilder.Map throws an exception for a parameter of a nullable value type with a default value #45867
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Getting HTTP Error 503. with 0x800704e7 randomly #45934
  • ArgumentException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46261
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Changing reflection-base json configuration to PostConfigure #46303
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity
  • Source-build should also use the release runtime. #46299
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0.x
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Bump ua-parser-js from 0.7.32 to 0.7.33 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #46295
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview2 #46282
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update api template to use new Random APIs #46298
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Tweak Dependabot configuration #46283
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2097875 #46279
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Support manual loc builds creating a PR #46278
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-runtime
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
    area-runtime
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Alerts do not display from ctor or OnAppearing when not in a NavPage/Shell #12970
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12969
  • Additional iOS Keyboard Next Preference #12968
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button background not appearing when setting Gradient and Shadow #12959
  • ApplyQueryAttributes when go back to one tab and two views is invoked in the wrong view #12957
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #12956
  • Using central package management causes build breaking NU1009 with MAUI projects #12953

Closed

  • OnRequest permission invoke on mainactivity shows warning as it supports only v23.0 and later #12764
  • LineBreakMode cannot be used on a button on Windows #10553
    Backlog
  • Button with Image on iOS and MacOS always missalign #8528
  • he program '[17988] myFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12965
  • I'm not really clear on the status of this issue. Either way, this seems like more of a "how to" discussion than an actual issue in .NET MAUI. You definitely should be able to still use a custom splash screen. #12962
  • MAUI WebView on Android not loading Cesium static web page. #7191
    Backlog
  • Add a splash screen to a .NET MAUI app project on per-platform approaches #12917
  • Publish iOS app fails due to missing *.resources.dll files #12296
  • DllImport with .a file for iOS in MAUI #12675
  • Nested FlexLayout/BindableLayout Very Slow #12908
  • MAUI cannot get the length of the stream from FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync on Android #12776
  • code 2147942405 #12812
  • Maui for Windows freezes when resizing Entry control for email address #12377
    Backlog
  • [Custom Control] HotReload doesn't work for newly added nested items #11106
    Backlog
  • repro for Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812 #11802
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft .Net Maui Toolkit Cannot resolve type EventToCommandBehavior #12642
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] Grid layout calls Measure on its children way too many times #11140
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [Build] Mega pipeline net8 #12966
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

  • Try resolve the dotnet build crash on macos #12954
    do-not-merge

    community ✨

Merged

  • [Tizen] refactor splash updater #12897

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server: Allow users to explicitly specify the target SQL Server version/type #30163
  • Add warning/code analyzer that mapping in function call produces different SQL than direct mapping #30162
  • STRING_AGG not recognized after updating from EFCore 6 to EFCore 7 #30161
  • UDDT (User Defined Data Type) with a default does not have default applied. #30160
  • Calling DbFunction does not work if the input parameter is EF.Function. #30159
  • Query operator to instruct EF to not cache #30158

Closed

  • SQL Server: Precision isn't respected when sending DateTime parameters #30110
  • Error when building bundle in Dockerfile #29927
  • EF Core ChangeTracker entities snapshot and reset to that snapshot #30097
  • When did we get support for extension functions(mehods) inside IQueriable.Select ? #30148
  • Is it possible that SavingChangesAsync will be called again before SavedChangesAsync returns in SaveChangesInterceptor #30103
  • Circular dependency was detected in the data to be saved #30093
  • add-migration and Update-database don`t work on VS Community 2022 Preview(1.7.5.0 Preview 2.0) #30090
  • Add-Migration is not useful #30089
  • Migration missing on Linux, but not on Windows. #30088
  • Migrations slow build after upgrading from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 6 #30057
  • EF Core slower than EF 6 #30048
  • How to convert from IModel to RelationalModel and preserve annotations EFC #29980
  • Upgrade to EFCore 7 Results in Unexpected Index Changes #29847
  • How to disable plan caching #30152
  • No relational provider - TPT #30157
  • How to add conventions by assembly instead of manually setting them up in ConfigureConventions #30150

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Support for DateOnly/TimeOnly for SQL Server #30109
